meanings.definition: A small flat case containing magnetic tape on two reels, used for recording or playing back audio or video.
meanings.sent1: I found an old cassette in the attic with music recorded on it.
meanings.sent2: The cassette player clicked as I pressed play to listen to the recording.
meanings.sent3: My cat mistook the cassette for a toy and batted it around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like a cassette, each moment carefully recorded and stored.
meanings.sent5: The cassette spun slowly, whispering the secrets of the past.

meanings.definition: A cartridge for holding and winding photographic film.
meanings.sent1: The photographer loaded a fresh cassette of film into the camera.
meanings.sent2: She carefully wound the film onto the cassette before developing it.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel mistook the shiny cassette for a nut and tried to bury it.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a cassette of memories, each frame capturing a moment in time.
meanings.sent5: The cassette clicked as the film wound tightly, preserving the scene forever.
